main.name: Ghulam Farid
main.description: I am a react engineer and I use react.js to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: I am Ghulam Farid, a goal-driven individual with strong communication skillset seeking a computer specialist role bringing experience with React, Data Science and Machine learning. I wanted to work in competitive, dynamic, and cooperative environment where there will be maximum chance of grow as an innovative proficient and committed person. I have an aptitude for all things research, design and innovation related.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: React Developer
work.description: Responsible for developing reuseable components and handling APIs data at frontend.
